result.html: Gortaíodh a bheanHis wife was injured.
result.ponchtml: Gortaíoḋ a ḃeanHis wife was injured.

result.eng: Two people were killed and three others were injured.
result.ga: Maraíodh beirt agus goineadh triúr eile
result.orig: Maraíodh beirt agus goineadh triúr eile
result.html: Maraíodh beirt agus goineadh triúr eileTwo people were killed and three others were injured.
result.ponchtml: Maraíoḋ beirt agus goineaḋ triúr eileTwo people were killed and three others were injured.

result.eng: It was a miracle that nobody was injured.
result.ga: Ba mhíorúilt é nár goineadh aon duine
result.orig: Ba mhíorúilt é nár goineadh aon duine
result.html: Ba mhíorúilt é nár goineadh aon duineIt was a miracle that nobody was injured.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁíorúilt é nár goineaḋ aon duineIt was a miracle that nobody was injured.
